item.title: Retronerding with the Commodore Amiga
item.description: The Commodore Amiga was the worlds best home computer until 1994. It had fantastic graphics capabilities, great games, and you could even do homework on it if you wanted (yeah right). Ricki stopped using his Amiga back in the 90s, but recently retreived it from the attic again after spending a couple of years developing games for the even older Commodore 64. He has been developing a new Amiga game the last 1.
